title: [The Flying potato]
creator_contributor_role: Tarnagulla and Marong Primary Schools and Paul Fletcher, creator
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: Join the kids of Marong and Tarnagulla primary schools as they ride the magic flying potato
description: Work created by students from Tarnagulla and Marong primary schools with animator Paul Fletcher as part of the artists in schools program sponsored by the Department of Education and Arts Victoria. Contains original artwork by the students (from lower primary levels) that has been animated by the artist, footage of the students and animations created by the older students. Storyline is minimal but includes a flying potato adventure, a monster circus and experimental animation.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1004947; Tales from two schools; Active; 2002
related_objects: Collection; B1006078; Memory Grid Primary Student Works; Active
